alert.note: Alert for Northern Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued September 29 at 12:28PM MST until September 30 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 8 PM MST SATURDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 8 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Advisory, south winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. For the second Wind Advisory, south winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Areas along the Mogollon Rim. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, from 10 AM to 8 PM MST Saturday. For the second Wind Advisory, from 10 AM to 8 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
